Working alongsid CANDIDATE 			Kathy Ememere

Location:			UK, Corby

Member, Project Management Institute
CAREER SUMMARY
Apr 2022 to date Alcumus
Position: IT Business Analyst, Global Contractor Management System
Applying appropriate business analysis approaches across multiple projects.
Understanding customer needs and communicate these effectively to project teams.
Gathering and understanding the business needs within specific projects and operational improvement initiatives through workshops and other appropriate methods.
Ensuring solutions meet strategic, operational, and meet customer requirements.
Working alongside developers, QA and designers to ensure that user stories are complete, clear, concise and comprehensible.
Ensuring shared understanding of requirements and solutions across the teams and stakeholders.
Promoting the Business Analyst function within Product & Technology and throughout the business.
Highlighting any identified issues with the current process and business model
Take part in designing potential solutions to any problems identified during the research phase
Participating in preparing and delivering a report of their findings to leadership with comprehensive risk and impact assessments along with the Project Manager.
Participating in developing comprehensive end-to-end (E2E) test cases with QA at the application and multi-application levels
Carrying out training sessions and workshops to guide relevant teams
Carrying out periodic quality checks to ensure the solution meets all quality expectations - Reviewing the acceptance tests associated with the acceptance criteria
Analysing the new requirements from clients and translating into functional specifications for the product developers - Evolving the details of the user stories through conversations with the developers
Attending iteration retrospectives when necessary to provide feedback and improve the development process
Providing configuration application to support business requirements and design (including mock-ups) and the creation and maintenance of configuration documentation
Establishing effective working relationships within the project teams
Applying timely and effective communication within projects to manage risk and escalations.
Supporting Technology Programmes and projects to establish requirements, scope, business case and related project documentation
Assist in baselining, establishing, tracking, and monitoring project KPIs and OKRs
Feb 2021 to Apr 2022 Syngenta
Position: Business Analyst, CP R&D IT
Led the business analysis activities for multiple R&D capabilities; ensuring that cross process opportunities are identified, understood, and leveraged.
Ensured business needs are translated into user stories that enable the incremental delivery of value to R&D through IT solutions.
Worked with members of Syngenta IT Leadership to create and maintain a visible and well understood stakeholder map.
Maintained product backlogs and created user stories describing the changes that are required.
Ensured an effective engagement strategy.
Interfaced with key subject matter experts and leaders at various levels.
Together with key stakeholders, established direction for IT solutions and related ways of working.
Ensured that an up-to-date investment portfolio is maintained in order that priorities are clear and directly drive business needs & strategy.
Accountabilities
Defined and maintained a portfolio of investment in IT solutions aligned to a 3-year strategy
Developed business cases for initiatives
Managed multiple product backlogs in the format of prioritized user stories
Ensured all User Stories are INVESTable
Worked effectively with key stakeholders to ensure the backlog is accurate and continuously priori-tized
She was an active member of the analystâ€™s community, contributed to setting best practice, peer review, mentoring and coaching.
Oct 2019 to Feb 2021 HSBC
Position: Business Analyst / Scrum Master
As a Technical Lead, was responsible for major workflow revision

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
